posts.post_content: I actually really like this card. Sure, this 6 CMC isn't ideal, but I'd pay 4 colorless for an extra card every turn, and 2 more colorless for a reusable pinger to get rid of chump blocks late game. And if they don't have any eligible creature targets, one to the face every turn will add up. Every point matters. 4/5

posts.post_content: This feels odd as a throwback to [Nin, the Pain Artist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nin, the Pain Artist). It could have easily just dealt 1 damage to a creature and made that creature's controller draw a card. Then it would have cost much less and given you a more interesting choice: removal at a price, or self-harm with a reward?
